metadata.synopsis: Repeated ADSteel Watch StreetsAt wall near Hag Survivors.Flaming Fist Nephel talks about scanning of the citizens.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-47.689339;34.051392;-111.924316&camTarget=-47.521904;33.369663;-111.212128Wait for npc to talk

0.speaker: Fist Nephel
0.text: Evaluation is harmless. Make no sudden moves and no one gets hurt.

1.speaker: Fist Nephel
1.text: Pay attention when spoken to. Lord Gortash's passing necessitates a tightening of city security. Follow orders and no one need get hurt.

2.speaker: Fist Nephel
2.text: Designated citizens will please stand still for evaluation.

3.speaker: Fist Nephel
3.text: No one has anything to fear if everyone just does what they're told.
